verses.1: Topa aw, khang tawntungin koteʼ omna mun na hi hi.
verses.2: Mual liante a kipiansak ma, leitang le leitung na bawl ma pek, a tawntung a kipan a tawntung dongin Pasian na hi hi.
verses.3: Mi, leivui na suaksakkik a, “Mihingte aw, ciahkik un,” na ci hi.
verses.4: Bang hang hiam cih leh nangma muhna ah kum tul khat a bei ciangin zanni ahi a, zan ihmut laitakin khanlawh khat sung tawh ahi zongin a kibang bek hi.
verses.5: Nangmah in mite na phiat khia hi. Amaute pen a ihmu tawh kibang uh a, zingsangin a nokik lopa tawh kibang uh hi.
verses.6: Zingsangin palhin thaksuakkik a, nitak ciangin vulin a keu uh hi.
verses.7: Bang hang hiam cih leh nangma sinsona in kote hong susia a, na hehluatna in kote hong lausak gawp hi.
verses.8: Nangmah in ka mawhnate uh na mai ah na koih a, ka khialh simnate uh na maitang ah na koih hi.
verses.9: Bang hang hiam cih leh ka hun khempeuh uh na hehna-in bei a, ka nuntak hun uh husan khat bangin a bei hi.
verses.10: Koteʼ nuntak sung kum sawm sagih bang hi a, cidam le-ung kum sawm giat bang hi thei hi. Ahih hangin tua hunsung nangawn gimna le haksatna hi a, tua hunte bei pakin kote ka maimang uh hi.
verses.11: Nang hong kizahtak nadingin na sinsonaʼ vangliatna kua in thei a, na hehnaʼ husiatna kua in thei ahi hiam?
verses.12: Tua ahih ciangin pilna lungsim ka ngah theih nadingun ka nuntak hun uh a tomlam ka theih nadingun hong hilh in.
verses.13: Topa aw, hong kiheikik in. Bang tan sauvei ding hiam? Na nasemte hong hehpih in.
verses.14: Ka nuntak tawntung uh lungdamin ka kipak theih nadingun zingsangin na itna kip tawh kote hong lungkimsak in.
verses.15: Kote nong gimsak ni zah, siatna ka thuak uh kum phazah mah, kote hong kipaaksak in.
verses.16: Na nasemte tungah na nasepna, a tate uh tungah na minthanna, na vang hong kilangsak in.
verses.17: Koteʼ Topa Pasian aw, kote tungah na thupha hong tungsak inla, koteʼ nasepna khempeuh hong tangtungsak in.
